title: About Me
text:
Hi, Iâ€™m Venkatesh Kastala, a Data Engineer specializing in Python, SQL, and big data technologies. I excel in optimizing ETL pipelines, cloud migrations, and real-time data processing, leveraging tools like AWS, Azure, Kafka, and Spark to turn complex data into actionable insights.
Experience: 4+ years in data engineering and analytics, with a track record of reducing costs and improving data throughput.
Proficient in Python, SQL, and big data tools; experienced with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) and real-time data streaming.
Developed real-time data streaming platforms and predictive models to drive business insights.
To leverage my expertise to solve complex data challenges, contribute to impactful projects, and advance into a leadership role.

title: My Portfolio
text:
Hi, this is Venkatesh Kastala.
Welcome to my personal portfolio. In this repository, want to demonstrate my skills, projects and to keep track of my progression in Data Analytics and Data Science topics.

title: SkillSet
text:
Technical Skills

Programming Languages : Python, SQL, R, PL/SQL
Python Libraries: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, SciPy, ggplot2, SQLAlchemy, Boto3
Data Management : SQL, Hive, Snowflake, Presto, AWS S3, Azure
Data Visualization : Tableau, Power BI, Cognos, Streamlit, Plotly
Cloud Services : AWS - EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, Step Functions and Glue
Methodologies : Agile, Lean, Six Sigma, Data Lifecycle
Big Data Technologies: Apache Spark, Hadoop, Apache Airflow, Kafka
Integration Tools: DevOps, Docker, API Gateways
